short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: easily download YouTube video caption in JSON or TXT format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube hosts a wealth of excellent educational and informative videos, with invaluable content in their subtitles. This extension lets you download the subtitle files with just one click while watching.

âœ¨ Key Features:

- Download subtitles in JSON or TXT format
- Simple user interface, no complicated settings
- Works for all YouTube videos (that provide subtitles)
- Downloaded subtitle files automatically named after video title for easy management

ğŸš€ How to Use:

1. Add and enable this extension
2. Open any YouTube video page
3. Click the extension icon and select subtitle format (JSON or TXT)

The downloaded subtitle file will be automatically saved to your downloads folder

---

Whether you want to learn new skills, research new subjects, or simply keep notes on video content, this caption downloader will greatly facilitate your needs. Unlock the full potential of YouTube videos and unearth more valuable knowledge!
